description: Manage smart locks and access codes across your Seam-connected devices. Check lock status, lock or unlock doors, and create, update, or delete time-bound access codes for one or many locks. Streamline property operations and guest access with bulk code management.

seamApiKey.description: Your Seam API key from https://console.seam.co/

tools.name: list_locks
tools.description: List all smart locks connected to your Seam account

tools.name: get_status
tools.description: Get a comprehensive status overview of all locks including battery levels, lock states, and any issues

tools.name: get_lock
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific lock

device_id.description: The device ID of the lock
The device ID of the lock to lock
The device ID of the lock to unlock

tools.name: get_lock_status
tools.description: Get the current lock status (locked/unlocked) of a specific lock

device_id.description: The device ID of the lock

tools.name: create_access_code
tools.description: Create an access code on a specific lock with optional time limits

code.description: The PIN code (e.g., '1234'). If not provided, a random code will be generated

name.description: Name/label for the access code (e.g., 'Guest Code', 'Cleaner')

ends_at.description: When the code expires (ISO 8601 format, e.g., '2025-01-22T12:00:00Z')

device_id.description: The device ID of the lock

starts_at.description: When the code becomes active (ISO 8601 format, e.g., '2025-01-01T16:00:00Z')

tools.name: create_access_code_on_multiple_locks
tools.description: Create the same access code on multiple locks (useful for creating one code for all locks in a location)

code.description: The PIN code (e.g., '1234'). If not provided, random codes will be generated

name.description: Name/label for the access code (e.g., 'Guest Code', 'Seattle Locks')

starts_at.description: When the code becomes active (ISO 8601 format)

device_ids.description: Array of device IDs to create the access code on

location_filter.description: Optional: filter locks by location name (e.g., 'Seattle', 'Building A')

tools.name: list_access_codes
tools.description: List all access codes, optionally filtered by device

device_id.description: Optional: filter by specific device ID

tools.name: delete_access_code
tools.description: Delete an access code from a lock

access_code_id.description: The ID of the access code to delete

tools.name: update_access_code
tools.description: Update an existing access code (change name, code, or time limits)

name.description: New name for the access code

access_code_id.description: The ID of the access code to update
